function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Studying patients with COVID-19, including those with a direct link to the epicenter, poses a risk of exposure to the virus for the researchers.","Impact":"Potential exposure to the virus can lead to infection and transmission to others.","Mitigation":"Adopt strict safety protocols, use personal protective equipment, and conduct research in controlled environments.","Technologies":"Sterilization equipment, containment facilities, and advanced air filtration systems.","People":"Researchers, medical professionals, and support staff involved in the study.","Owner":"Research institutions and medical organizations."},{"Description":"Reviewing a small subset of literature on COVID-19 may lead to incomplete understanding of the disease and its characteristics.","Impact":"Incomplete understanding may result in misinformed decisions related to prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive literature reviews, collaborate with experts in the field, and cross-verify findings from multiple sources.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, collaboration platforms, and artificial intelligence for data synthesis.","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, and policymakers relying on the literature.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and government health agencies."}]}
